notes.note: Keynote on "OCCAM: Open Curation for Computer Architecture Modeling" by Prof. Bruce Childers and Prof. Alex Jones (University of Pittsburgh, USA)

Talks by Vittorio Zaccaria (Politecnico di Milano, Italy), Christophe Guillon and Christian Bertin (STMicroelectronics, France), Christoph Reichenbach (Johann-Wolfgang Goethe Universitat Frankfurt, Germany)

title: Thematic session - making computer engineering a science
